FilterItemPortable.Name: A vencer
FilterItemPortable.ConditionsContent: <ArrayOfFilterCondition xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <FilterCondition Index="1"> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string">A.HANDLE IN (SELECT P.DOCUMENTO FROM FN_PARCELAS P WHERE P.PAGAMENTOSUSPENSO = 'N' AND P.VALORESBAIXADOS < P.VALOR AND P.DATAVENCIMENTO >= @HOJE )</Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>true</IsManuallyDefined> </FilterCondition> </ArrayOfFilterCondition>
FilterItemPortable.WhereClauseContent: <WhereClause xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <Where>A.HANDLE IN (SELECT P.DOCUMENTO FROM FN_PARCELAS P WHERE P.PAGAMENTOSUSPENSO = 'N' AND P.VALORESBAIXADOS < P.VALOR AND P.DATAVENCIMENTO >= @HOJE )</Where> <Parameters /> </WhereClause>

FilterItemPortable.Name: Liquidados
FilterItemPortable.ConditionsContent: <ArrayOfFilterCondition xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <FilterCondition Index="1"> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string">A.HANDLE IN (SELECT P.DOCUMENTO FROM FN_PARCELAS P GROUP BY P.DOCUMENTO HAVING SUM(P.VALORESBAIXADOS) = SUM(P.VALOR))</Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>true</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> </ArrayOfFilterCondition>
FilterItemPortable.WhereClauseContent: <WhereClause xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <Where>A.HANDLE IN (SELECT P.DOCUMENTO FROM FN_PARCELAS P GROUP BY P.DOCUMENTO HAVING SUM(P.VALORESBAIXADOS) = SUM(P.VALOR))</Where> <Parameters /> </WhereClause>

FilterItemPortable.Name: Pesquisar
FilterItemPortable.AdvancedFilterConditions: 1 E 2 E 3 E 4 E 5 E 6 E 7 E 8
FilterItemPortable.ConditionsContent: <ArrayOfFilterCondition xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <FilterCondition Index="1" FieldName="DOCUMENTODIGITADO"> <FieldDefinitionName>StringFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>contém</Name> <DatabaseOperator>LIKE</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> <FilterCondition Index="2" FieldName="PESSOA"> <FieldDefinitionName>AssociationFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>igual</Name> <DatabaseOperator>=</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <Value <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <UserInputRequired>true</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> <FilterCondition Index="4" FieldName="OPERACAO"> <FieldDefinitionName>AssociationFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>igual</Name> <DatabaseOperator>=</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string"></Value> <UserInputRequired>true</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <UserInputRequired>true</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> <FilterCondition Index="6" <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <UserInputRequired>true</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> <DatabaseOperator>>=</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <UserInputRequired>true</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> </FilterCondition> </ArrayOfFilterCondition>
FilterItemPortable.WhereClauseContent: <WhereClause xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <Where>1=1 AND 1=1 AND 1=1 AND 1=1 AND 1=1 AND 1=1 AND 1=1 AND 1=1</Where> <Parameters /> </WhereClause>

FilterItemPortable.Name: Vencidos
FilterItemPortable.ConditionsContent: <ArrayOfFilterCondition xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <FilterCondition Index="1"> <Value xsi:type="xsd:string">A.HANDLE IN (SELECT P.DOCUMENTO FROM FN_PARCELAS P WHERE P.PAGAMENTOSUSPENSO = 'N' AND P.VALORESBAIXADOS < P.VALOR AND P.DATAVENCIMENTO < @HOJE )</Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>true</IsManuallyDefined> <ParameterCollection /> </FilterCondition> </ArrayOfFilterCondition>
FilterItemPortable.WhereClauseContent: <WhereClause xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <Where>A.HANDLE IN (SELECT P.DOCUMENTO FROM FN_PARCELAS P WHERE P.PAGAMENTOSUSPENSO = 'N' AND P.VALORESBAIXADOS < P.VALOR AND P.DATAVENCIMENTO < @HOJE )</Where> <Parameters /> </WhereClause>
